name: Creamsicle the Cat
description:
Creamsicle the Cat

By Alyssa Montgomery

A 3D adventure puzzle game where you play as a chonky orange tabby named Creamsicle who wants to collect fruity popsicles!

CREDITS

Music by CarlaD at https://soundcloud.com/carladmusic

Text by Loading.io

Fruity Icons by AomAm

C# Inventory help by Jayanam
